TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 單一來源的多點流量的用戶端接收器，也稱為特定來源多點傳送 (SSM，Source Specific Multicast)。

span.span: A client receiver for multicast traffic from a single source, also known as Source Specific Multicast (SSM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須知道的多點傳送的群組位址和寄件者來源位址。The multicast group address and sender source address must be known. 除了接收多點傳送的資料來自特定寄件者用戶端也可以傳送回給寄件者的單點傳送資料。In addition to receiving multicast data from a specific sender, the client can also send unicast data back to the sender. 多個來源接收多點傳送，或來源不事先知道時使用類別。To receive multicast from multiple sources, or when the sources aren't known in advance, use the class instead.

param.name: sourceAddress
param.span: 此收件者要訂閱的寄件者來源位址。

span.span: The sender source address for this receiver to subscribe to.

param.name: groupAddress
param.span: 此收件者要訂閱的多點傳送群組位址。

span.span: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.

param.name: localPort
param.span: 此收件者要繫結的本機連接埠。

span.span: The local port for this receiver to bind to.

summary.span: 建立新的 UDP 用戶端，可以訂閱群組位址，並從單一來源接收資料包。

span.span: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from a single source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式的 UDP 多點傳送的通訊端將與相關聯的群組位址和連接埠，但不會繫結或否則請使用通訊端。The constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket. `groupAddress`參數可能是由 IPv6 或 IPv4 多點傳送位址。The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. 不過的位址家族`sourceAddress`和`groupAddress`參數必須相同。However, the address family of the `sourceAddress` and `groupAddress` parameters must the same. `localPort`參數必須指定低於 1024 的連接埠。The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.

exception.span: 和 必須是相同的位址系列。

span.span: and must be the same address family.

exception.span: 是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 Nothing)。

-or-

is less than 0

is less than 1024

summary.span: 繫結通訊端並開始加入多點傳送群組中的作業，以允許從單一來源位址接收資料包。

span.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.
Returns .
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將 UDP 多點傳送的通訊端繫結至本機連接埠，並聯結多點傳送的群組，以允許從單一來源位址接收資料包。The method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address. 中指定多點傳送的群組位址、 單一來源位址和繫結至的本機連接埠建構函式。The multicast group address, single source address, and local port to bind to are specified in the constructor. 中指定的方法`callback`加入多點傳送的群組作業完成時，會叫用參數。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed. 如果執行階段，需要方法也會執行原則檢查，確認 允許用戶端存取多點傳送的群組。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果用戶端不允許存取會擲回。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with .

exception.span: 多點傳送群組已經加入，或加入作業目前正在進行中。

span.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

summary.span: 開始從已加入的多點傳送群組接收封包之作業，並在封包從指定的寄件者送達群組時，叫用指定的回呼。

span.span: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from a specified sender.
Returns .
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法開始從自單一的寄件者加入多點傳送群組接收 UDP 封包的作業。The method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from a single sender. 中指定的本機連接埠、 多點傳送的群組和寄件者來源位址建構函式。The local port, multicast group, and sender source address are specified in the constructor. 多點傳送的用戶端必須也已經完成聯結多點傳送群組。The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group. 中指定的方法`callback`已收到封包時，會叫用參數。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 就可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果接收作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是 UDP 與不常見。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果發生通訊端失敗，就會擲回。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的錯誤指定的成員為列舉型別。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法開始作業，將 UDP 封包傳送至先前指定的來源。The method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the source previously specified. 某些通訊協定會使用此資訊來傳遞流量控制，品質的服務統計資料或復原訊息。Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages. 中指定的方法`callback`在傳送封包時，會叫用參數。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has been sent. 用戶端必須先完成聯結多點傳送群組。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. 如果在指定的目的地連接埠`remotePort`參數是小於 1,024會擲回。If the destination port specified in the `remotePort` parameter is less than 1,024, a is thrown with . 就可能發生通訊端失敗的狀況，如果傳送作業失敗，以同步方式，雖然這是 UDP 與不常見。It is possible to have a socket failure if a send operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果發生通訊端失敗，就會擲回。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的錯誤指定的成員為列舉型別。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 離開多點傳送群組，並釋出目前的 類別執行個體和基礎 使用的所有資源。

span.span: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

span.span: Completes the asynchronous join group operation to a multicast group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成非同步的繫結至多點傳送群組的通訊端與聯結作業。The method completes an asynchronous bind to a socket and join operation to a multicast group. 如果執行階段，需要方法也會執行原則檢查，確認 允許用戶端存取多點傳送的群組。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果用戶端不允許存取會擲回。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with . 如果在執行 加入群組作業中，通訊端失敗就會擲回。If there is a socket failure while performing the join group operation, a is thrown. 收到的錯誤指定的成員為列舉型別。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 取得或設定 的接收緩衝區大小 (以位元組為單位)，用於這個 執行個體上多點傳送的接收作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 接收緩衝區的大小，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReceiveBufferSize`屬性會取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的接收緩衝區的基礎用於多點傳送的接收作業，在此執行個體。The `ReceiveBufferSize` property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying used for multicast receive operations on this instance. 具體而言，`ReceiveBufferSize`屬性會控制封包到達，但尚未呼叫應用程式時，由堆疊所用的緩衝區大小方法。Specifically, the `ReceiveBufferSize` property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the method. 如果這個緩衝區填滿，而且封包一直出現在應用程式會呼叫之前和方法，舊的封包會遭到捨棄。If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the and methods, old packets will get dropped. 應用程式永遠無法收到舊的封包，並呼叫時，則改為將會收到較新的封包方法。The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the method. 在 Windows 上的接收緩衝區的預設大小為 8,192。The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192.

exception.span: 指定的緩衝區大小小於 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

exception.span: 尚未聯結多點傳送群組。

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

value.span: 傳送緩衝區大小，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SendBufferSize 屬性取得或設定大小，以位元組為單位的傳送緩衝區的基礎用於多點傳送的傳送作業，在此執行個體。The SendBufferSize property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying used for multicast send operations on this instance. 在 Mac OS X 上屬性會控制多少個位元組可位於其他呼叫之前的網路堆疊傳送等候緩衝區方法會開始失敗。On Mac OS X, the property controls how many bytes can be in the network stack's waiting-to-be-sent buffer before additional calls to the method start failing. Mac OS X 上的應用程式可能需要會關心這個屬性，如果它們傳送大量 UDP 封包的短時間範圍內。Applications on Mac OS X may need to be concerned with this property if they are sending a large number of UDP packets in a short timeframe. 在 Windows 中，呼叫方法會將較長的時間呼叫的值而定的回呼屬性，如果傳送緩衝區已滿。On Windows, calls to the method will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the property if the send buffer is full. 屬性唯一的控制項，使用者的緩衝區是否保持您的實體記憶體中鎖定，直到傳送完成。The property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes. 在 Windows 上的傳送緩衝區的預設大小為 8,192。The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192.

exception.span: 指定的緩衝區大小小於 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.

exception.span: 尚未聯結多點傳送群組。

span.span: The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
